servinfo.title: DTC U1140: Lost Communication with BCM (Reception Error)

servinfosub.title: Wiring Diagram
servinfosub.ptxt: Refer to DTC U1101: Lost Communication with TCM (Reception Error) .

servinfosub.title: DTC Detecting Condition and Trouble Area

entry.ptxt: BCM message data is missing from CAN communication.

action.ptxt: Go to Electronic Stability Program Check .

testgroup.title: DTC check for ESP®
testgroup.question: Is DTC U1140 and DTC U1073 detected together?

action.ptxt: Go to DTC U1073: Control Module Communication Bus Off (Petrol Engine Model) for troubleshooting.
Go to DTC U1073 (No. 1073): Control Module Communication Bus Off for troubleshooting.

test1.ptxt: Check connection of connectors of all control modules communicating by means of CAN.

action.ptxt: Check for intermittent trouble referring to Intermittent and Poor Connection Inspection .

testgroup.title: CAN communication circuit check

test1.ptxt: Turn ignition switch to OFF position.
Disconnect connectors of ESP® control module and BCM communicating by means of CAN.

testgroup.question: Is each CAN communication circuit between ESP® control module and BCM opened, shorted or high resistance?

action.ptxt: Repair or replace the CAN communication line.

testgroup.title: CAN communication circuit check

test1.ptxt: Disconnect connectors of all control modules communicating by means of CAN.

testgroup.question: Is each CAN communication circuit between disconnected control modules (other than ESP® control module and BCM) opened, shorted or high resistance?

action.ptxt: Repair or replace the CAN communication line.

test1.ptxt: Connect connectors of disconnected control modules communicating by means of CAN.

action.ptxt: Check ESP® control module power and ground circuit. If circuits are OK, substitute a known-good ESP® hydraulic unit / control module assembly and recheck.
Check applicable control module power and ground circuit. If circuit is OK, substitute a known-good applicable control module and recheck.
